## Project Information

**Project Name:** DiscordHabbo  
**Type:** Full-Stack React + Node.js Application  
**Frontend:** React 18 with CSS styling  
**Backend:** Express.js with CORS

## Development Setup

Both the frontend and backend need to run simultaneously for local development. See README.md for detailed instructions.
